title: Oce servers for over a year... When will we get Draft Normals and Ranked 24hours?
body:
I haven't seen anything from Riot regarding this but for those of us who play regularly late at night or just don't like blind normals there seems to be nothing to do but suck it up in blind normals getting creamed by high-elo premades because they cannot ranked either...

 Has anyone seen an update on server population for giving us real queues?

replies.body: You know why you're getting creamed by high elo premades? Because not enough people are online to match you with similarly skilled people, which is exactly why ranked is disabled during that time
